 <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שַׂק‎</span> **noun masculine**<sup>[[Josh.9.4|Josh 9:4]]</sup> ==sack, sackcloth== (see [[BDB#Schw|Schw]]<sup>ZAW xi (1891), 173</sup> who conjectures Egyptian origin; Late Hebrew <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סַק‎</span> ***sackcloth*** (rare); Assyrian <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***ša‡‡u***</u></abbr>, ***sack*** ([[BDB#Dl|Dl]]<sup>HWB 687 a</sup>), ***sackcloth*** ([[BDB#Wkl|Wkl]]<sup>Altor. Forsch, vi. 44</sup>); Ethiopic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> = Biblical Hebrew; Aramaic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎סַקָּא‎</span>, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">; Greek <span class="bdbLangGreek">σάκκος</span> [[BDB#Lewy|Lewy]]<sup>Fremdw. 87</sup>); — absolute <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שׂ‎</span> [[Gen.37.34|Gen 37:34]] +, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שָׂ֑ק‎</span> [[Jer.48.37|Jer 48:37]] +; suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שַׂקִּי‎</span> [[Ps.30.12|Ps 30:12]], etc.; plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שַׂקִּים‎</span> [[Josh.9.4|Josh 9:4]] +, suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שַׂקֵּיהֶם‎</span> [[Gen.42.35|Gen 42:35]] — 

**1.** ***sack***, for grain [[Gen.42.25|Gen 42:25]]; [[Gen.42.27|Gen 42:27]] (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אַמְתַּחַת‎</span>), v[[Gen.42.35|Gen 42:35]] v[[Gen.42.35|Gen 42:35]] ([[BDB#E|E]]), [[Josh.9.4|Josh 9:4]] ([[BDB#J|J]][[BDB#E|E]]), perhaps also [[Lev.11.32|Lev 11:32]] ([[BDB#P|P]]). 

**2.** ***sackcloth:*** 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **a.** worn in mourning and humiliation (see [[BDB#Now|Now]]<sup>Archaeology i. 192 f.</sup> SA[[BDB#Cook|Cook]]<sup>Ency. Bib. under the word</sup>), either loose garment like sack, or piece of similar material (of rough, dark hair), fastened round body: put (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שִׂים‎</span>) on loins [[Gen.37.34|Gen 37:34]] ([[BDB#J|J]]), [[1Kgs.20.31|1Kgs 20:31]], on (bare) flesh [[1Kgs.21.27|1Kgs 21:27]]; [[2Kgs.6.30|2Kgs 6:30]], compare [[Jer.48.37|Jer 48:37]]; [[Job.16.15|Job 16:15]] (with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תָּפַר‎</span>); <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְהַעֲלֵיתִי עַלכָּֿלמָֿתְנַיִם שׂ‎</span> [[Amos.8.10|Amos 8:10]] usually girt on (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חָגַר‎</span>) [[2Sam.3.31|2Sam 3:31]]; [[Isa.15.3|Isa 15:3]]; [[Isa.22.12|Isa 22:12]]; [[Jer.4.8|Jer 4:8]]; [[Jer.6.26|Jer 6:26]]; [[Jer.49.3|Jer 49:3]]; [[Ezek.7.18|Ezek 7:18]]; [[Ezek.27.31|Ezek 27:31]]; [[1Kgs.20.32|1Kgs 20:32]]; [[Joel.1.8|Joel 1:8]], compare [[Isa.3.24|Isa 3:24]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כִּסָּה בַּשּׂ‎</span> [[2Kgs.19.1|2Kgs 19:1]]; [[2Kgs.19.2|2Kgs 19:2]] = [[Isa.37.1|Isa 37:1]]; [[Isa.37.2|Isa 37:2]]; [[Jonah.3.6|Jonah 3:6]]; [[Jonah.3.8|Jonah 3:8]]; [[1Chr.21.16|1Chr 21:16]], figurative of heavens (compare <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קָדַר‎</span>), <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אָשִׂים כְּסוּתָם‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שׂ‎</span> [[Isa.50.3|Isa 50:3]] late <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לָבַשׁ שׂ‎</span> ***put on sackcloth*** [[Jonah.3.5|Jonah 3:5]]; [[Esth.4.1|Esth 4:1]], compare v[[Esth.4.2|Esth 4:2]]; [[Ps.35.13|Ps 35:13]]; [[Ps.69.12|Ps 69:12]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בְּצוֺם וְשׂ‎</span> [[Neh.9.1|Neh 9:1]], compare [[Dan.9.3|Dan 9:3]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פִּתַּח שׂ‎</span> ***loosen sackcloth*** [[Isa.20.2|Isa 20:2]] (+ <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מֵעַל‎</span>), [[Ps.30.12|Ps 30:12]] (opposed to <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שִׂמְחָה‎</span>), <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מֵעַל‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הֵסִיר שׂ‎</span> [[Esth.4.4|Esth 4:4]]. 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **b.** same garment (or material) spread out (to lie on), [[2Sam.21.10|2Sam 21:10]] (with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הִטָּה‎</span>), [[Isa.58.5|Isa 58:5]] (with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הִצִּיעַ‎</span>), compare [[Esth.4.3|Esth 4:3]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיִּשְׁכַּב בַּשׂ‎</span> [[1Kgs.21.27|1Kgs 21:27]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לִינוּ בַּשּׂ‎</span> [[Joel.1.13|Joel 1:13]].
